<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the control text height. Supported control [[ctrlType|types]] are:
* [[DialogControls-Text|CT_STATIC]] 0
* [[CT_EDIT]] 2 <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.57.135040</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>
* [[DialogControls-Text|CT_STRUCTURED_TEXT]] 13

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlTextHeight''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_h = [[ctrlTextHeight]] _ctrl;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlFontHeight]] [[ctrlTextWidth]] [[ctrlSetText]] [[ctrlType]] [[Arma: GUI Configuration]]
</value></part></template>
